graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:ToolsCreateWebhookInput!)
{
	toolsCreateWebhook (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsGetWebhooks (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsFindWebhook (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	toolsFindWebhookById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:ToolsUpdateWebhookInput!)
{
	toolsUpdateWebhook (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	toolsDeleteWebhookById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsDeleteWebhooks (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		name
		service
		endpoint
		externalId
		events
		secret
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
